forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain overnight. Low 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy during the evening, then windy with periods of showers overnight. Low 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and wind. Rain may be heavy late. Potential for flooding rains. High 16C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and wind. Rain may be heavy late. Potential for flooding rains. High 61F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Potential for flooding rains. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Potential for flooding rains. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
